game.name: The Pale Piper
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 복잡하게 상호 연결된 세계에서 개발자가 정성을 들여 직접 설계한 챌린지를 점프하고, 달리고, 굴러서 통과하세요. 스킬을 마스터하면서 강력한 적수를 뛰어넘고, 낯선 캐릭터와 만나고, 숨겨진 루트를 찾아내 '피리 부는 사나이' 전설에 뿌리를 둔 뒤틀린 우주의 어두운 비밀을 밝혀내세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Descend into a dark reinterpretation of the Pied Piper myth. Master tight, precise movement through a decaying, interconnected world as you uncover hidden paths, outwit deadly threats, and unravel the secrets buried beneath its ruins.
